level.heading: Use of official mail by officials-elect.
level.text: In addition to government employees and elected officials as defined in § 2-701, the following officials may mail materials as official mail:
The Chairman-elect and members-elect of the Council.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 1-118
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 1-118, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 2-701.
